metadata.title: CVE-2024-24784 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The ParseAddressList function incorrectly handles comments (text withinparentheses) within display names. Since this is a misalignment withconforming address parsers, it can result in different trust decisionsbeing made by programs using different parsers.

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
